autumn.lang.internals

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.internals.Helpers

  • public final class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods that allow the compiler to generate simpler bytecode.

    Note: This class is not intended for use directly by programmers.

    • Method Detail

      • findEnumConstant

        public static java.lang.Enum findEnumConstant(java.lang.Enum[] constants,
                              java.lang.String name)
        This method finds a named enum-constant in an array of enum-constants.

        This method is used in the implementation of the valueOf(String) method in enums.

        Parameters:
        constants - is the array that may contain the named enum-constant.
        name - is the name of the enum-constant to find.
        Returns:
        the named enum-constant.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if constants is null.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if name is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the named enum-constant is not present in the array.

      • newImmutableList

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> newImmutableList(java.lang.Iterable<T> iterable)
        This method creates a new immutable-list from an iterable data-structure.
        Parameters:
        iterable - is the data-structure that contains the elements of the new list.
        Returns:
        the new immutable list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the iterable is null.

      • debug

        public static void debug(java.lang.String file,
         int line,
         int column,
         LocalsMap locals)
        This method is invoked by debug-statements in order to implement breakpoints.
        Parameters:
        file - is the file that contains the breakpoint.
        line - is the line-number where the breakpoint is located.
        column - is the column-number where the the breakpoint is located.
        locals - describes the local variables in at the time the breakpoint was hit.

      • setter

        public static Prototype setter(Prototype owner,
               java.lang.String name,
               Module module,
               java.lang.String function)
        This method is invoked by a setter-statement.
        Parameters:
        owner - is the object that contains the property.
        name - is the name of the property.
        module - is the module that contains the handler function.
        function - is the name of the handler function.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of the prototype.

      • getter

        public static Prototype getter(Prototype owner,
               java.lang.String name,
               Module module,
               java.lang.String function)
        This method is invoked by a getter-statement.
        Parameters:
        owner - is the object that contains the property.
        name - is the name of the property.
        module - is the module that contains the handler function.
        function - is the name of the handler function.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of the prototype.

      • method

        public static Prototype method(Prototype owner,
               java.lang.String key,
               Module module,
               java.lang.String function)
        This method is invoked by a method-statement.
        Parameters:
        owner - is the object that contains the method.
        key - is the name + parameter-list-descriptor of the method.
        module - is the module that contains the handler function.
        function - is the name of the handler function.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of the prototype.

      • delegate

        public static Delegate delegate(Module module,
                java.lang.String method)
        This method searches for a particular function's delegate in a module.
        Parameters:
        module - is the module that provides the delegate.
        method - is the name of the delegated method.
        Returns:
        the delegate that refers to the named method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the module does not contain a method with the given name.

      • throwIndexOutOfBoundsException

        public static void throwIndexOutOfBoundsException(int index,
                                  int size)
        This method throws an index-out-of-bounds-exception when an index is out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        index - is the index that may be out of bounds.
        size - is the maximum allowed index plus one.
